name: Thrusty Ball
description:
One-button physics-based platformer.

Press any key to push in the direction indicated by the arrow - use this for moves, boosts, jumps, you name it.

Hotkeys:

R - reset at last checkpoint/start

S - restart level

N - play next level (from end screen)

M - return to map (from end screen)

Esc/F10 - pause menu (in-game)
